name: Nagarkot Sunrise & Bhadgaon Tour
description: This tour gives an excellent opportunity to the traveler to experience the first glimpse of Sunrise and the ancient arts and architectures of Bhaktapur (Bhadgaon) which are listed under UNESCO World Heritage Sites. Nagarkot is considered as one of the best view point for sunrise within the periphery of Kathmandu Valley. Where as Bhaktapur located just about 14 kilometers east of Kathmandu is famous for ancient Newari Culture and Art & Architectures. The major attractions of this city are 55 Window Palace (Pachpanna Jhayale Durbar), Golden Gate, Nyatapola Temple (five storied Pagoda temple), Lion's Gate and statue of Bhupatendra Malla.
